title: What monitor do u use to game? And why?

replies.body:
I have an LG Monitor.
I use it because I don't want to plug my HDMI cable into the 44" TV I have :/
IMO Monitors don't really matter as long as it gives 720p+

replies.body:
2xBenQ XL2411Z

I use two monitors, one for gaming/using main programs, and the other one, to mainly browser the internet, watching youtube videos which aren't too long and for the minecraft wiki when I'm playing vanilla.
When I play Avicus, I mainly have Teamspeak opened too.
